perturbation.changed_text:
SECTION ONE. DEFINITIONS

C. A *donation of $0.05 per Unit sold of Licensed Products within the Contract Territory payable to the **NFL Alumni Northern California Chapter. Donated amounts will be allocated and dispersed to the Northern California Chapter at the Company's discretion and as budget allows. Where the following per Unit conversion shall apply for the duration that donations are provided:

 a. (1) Bottle of BlackMP LivingWater = 1 Unit

 b. (1) 4oz bottle of BlackMPConcentrate = 30 Units

 c. (1) Bottle of Zezel ProbioticWater = 1 Unit

 d. (1) Bottle of Zayin Sports Water = 1 Unit  e. (1) Bottle Gridiron MVP™ Water= 1 Unit

 f. (1) Bottle Gridiron CBD H20 Probiotics™ Water = 1 Unit

 g. (1) 4oz bottle of Gridiron MVP™Concentrate = 30 Units

_____________
* The NFLA-NC will donate 15% of the above described proceeds to the NFLA.
** The Company will provide to the NFLA-NC upon request the most recent annual sales report of the Company's Licensed Products, if donations are made.
perturbation.explanation: Moving the remuneration details to the definitions section obscures its enforceability. Changing "beginning on the first full quarter" to "at the Company's discretion and as budget allows" introduces ambiguity and allows the company to avoid the donation more easily, and switching quarterly reports to annual, makes it harder to follow.

All amendments to this Agreement must be signed by all parties to this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text:
SECTION FOUR. REMUNERATION

F. "Licensed Products" shall mean BlackMP Living Water, BlackMP Concentrate, Zezel Probiotic Water, Zayin Sports Water, Gridiron CBD H2O Probiotics™ Water, Gridiron MVP™ and Gridiron MVP™ Concentrate using the Pro Football Legends Logo on some of the Licensed Products' affixed labels, hang-tags or packaging. Other products of the Company may be added to the list of Licensed Products during the Contract Period by written notification to the other parties of this Agreement. Amendments to this portion of the Agreement may be done without written consent.
perturbation.explanation: Moving definition of licensed products to Remuneration section and changing "all" to "some" reduces clarity and introducing the potential that not all products need the logo, leading to possible trademark issues. Changing "written amendment to this Agreement. All amendments to this Agreement must be signed by all parties to this Agreement." to "written notification to the other parties of this Agreement. Amendments to this portion of the Agreement may be done without written consent." bypasses the signature requirement allowing one party to make changes that may not benefit all.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Trademark Law, Contract Law - Amendment Clauses

perturbation.changed_text: Parties reluctantly agree to consider, if feasible, the possible addition of Gridiron CBD H2O Probiotic™ Water, pending legal review and market demand, to "Other Potential Products Under Consideration" as follows:
perturbation.explanation: Changing the language from a definitive agreement to an ambiguous consideration allows one party to delay or altogether void the inclusion of the CBD water into the licensed products, even though it was agreed. Renaming from “Licensed Products” to “Other Potential Products Under Consideration” changes from definitive inclusion to possible inclusion.
